description.value: You've practiced the art of taunting an enemy, ensuring they know death will only make you stronger. When you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Demoralize] an opponent, the target doesn't become temporarily immune to your attempts to Demoralize it unless you critically fail the check. If the target critically hit you with a Strike on its previous turn, the DC for this check is reduced by 4.

publication.title: Pathfinder #199: To Bloom Below the Web
